column4: Hi, I was just trying to install conky, however when I execute ./config in the terminal I get configure error: Can't locate X11 installation. How can I resolve this? [Linux noob]
delete the folder you have there and    sudo apt-get install conky
how can I now get conky on my desktop? I've used sudo apt-get install
there is a huge thread on ubuntuforums.org regarduing conky configuration. you will need to make a .conkyrc first
